author: wank_for_peace

author: grandmasterlau
comment: The AXS payment is available through their app or eService which is linked with Nets, VISA/Master, PayNow. [https://e-station.axs.com.sg/wSDK/core/home.php](https://e-station.axs.com.sg/wSDK/core/home.php) Otherwise you could try calling the student centre, but I suspect they are not keen on cash or nets payment.
analysis:
```json
{
  "sentiment": "neutral",
  "topics": ["administration", "payment"],
  "complaints": ["Lack of cash or Nets payment options at the student centre."],
  "suggestions": []
}
```
